    Subclasses of QuadBatch in playn.core
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    TriangleBatch
    A batch which renders indexed triangles.
    class 
    UniformQuadBatch
    A batch which renders quads by stuffing them into a big(ish) GLSL uniform variable.
